text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://smart.who.int/ips-pilgrimage/CodeSystem/IPS.HAJJ
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    CONSENT-KSAConsent for Kingdom of Saudi Arabia<INSERT TEXT FROM KSA: discuss pilgrim's consent to share their IPS during provision of clinical care during the Hajj event as well as any follow-up care that may be needed.>
    CONSENT-IDNConsent for Indonesia<INSERT TEXT FROM INDONESIA: discuss pilgrims's consent to utilize Satusehat to enable access to KSA to their IPS if they are in need of care during Hajj>
    CONSENT-MYSConsent for Malaysia<INSERT TEXT FROM MALAYSIA: discuss pilgrims's consent to utilize MySejahtera to enable access to KSA to their IPS if they are in need of care during Hajj>
    CONSENT-OMNConsent for Oman<INSERT TEXT FROM OMAN: discuss pilgrims's consent to utilize Oman's e-Health Portal to enable access to KSA to their IPS if they are in need of care>

name: IPS_HAJJ_CONSENT
title: IPS.HAJJ.CONSENT ValueSet of consent policies
description: ValueSet of codes for consent policies for Hajj pilgrims

concept.display: Consent for Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
